mapper.insert: INSERT INTO patient (userId, patientName, sex, age, oldHistory, allergiesHistory, habits) VALUES (#{userId}, #{patientName}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{oldHistory}, #{allergiesHistory}, #{habits})
mapper.update: UPDATE patient SET patientName = #{patientName}, sex = #{sex}, age = #{age}, oldHistory = #{oldHistory}, allergiesHistory = #{allergiesHistory}, habits = #{habits} WHERE userId = #{userId} LIMIT 1
mapper.select: SELECT * from patient WHERE userId = #{userId} LIMIT 1
